fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose one person each night to Greymail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Greymailed targets can talk normally during the day disregarding any effects that may inhibit or otherwise impact their speech.
- Choose a player during the day to receive their whispers for the remainder of the day.
- Players will be greymailed for the day phase after you Greymail them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have a greymailed target send at least 69 messages during the day phase, at least three times.
